ygData.subject: Re: Race war server.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... No, I hope they keep it as they ve advertised it; a straight up race war.  If you re not on the same team , open season. I hate PVP, but the race war
ygData.messageBody:
--- mark mark <markerob@...> wrote:
>
> This sounds great,, but.....
> I'd like to see an extra dimention added to it. I'd
> like to be able to petition the gm for a group
> switch, like an evil gnome necro getting added
> to the troll, dark elf and ogre team.

No, I hope they keep it as they've advertised it; a
straight up race war. If you're not on the same
'team', open season.

I hate PVP, but the race war server sounds quite
intriguing. I'm looking forward to really bonding
with my 'Troll Budders an smashin' da hummies an da
stunties an da pointie ears gud'.

In PVP, people won't often work together like you'd
think they would; you're not any less likely to be
PK'd as a low level Troll as with a low level human.
But on race war, we can band together and fight as
one. That just sounds like a lot of roleplaying fun!

===
:D
Dave's World
-No matter where you go, there you are-
"People will believe a lie either because they want to
believe it's true, or because they fear it is." Wizard's
First Rule, Sword of Truth, Terry Goodkind
